Articles.Content:
This is my new spaceplane collection, still under development!

It is made just for its look and the easy handling

Triungulin MK1

Status: Fully developed

This is a plane with a really quick rotation but it can be a little drunk sometimes. It flies like a charm and is able to pull up very quick. Made for recreational purposes, and not for long distances although you could do it, it would be better to use a quicker and more stable plane.

88 Parts

Triungulin MK2

Status: Still under construction

This plane was made just to impress users, with its inefficient holes and useless wings it is a beautiful plane. The plane has a quick rotation but doesn't have the quick pull up that the MK1 has. Of course this plane is able to fly and also able to sustain its stability.

89 Parts

Download links:

Triungulin MK1: http://bit.ly/XOYj8y

Triungulin MK2: http://bit.ly/ZBHUVw
Very unique designs, well done sir. At the moment, I cannot use them, but I will and I will come back with some in flight insight and most definitely some love
The Mk.2 looks like something cybran from supreme commander.

Very unique designs, well done sir. At the moment, I cannot use them, but I will and I will come back with some in flight insight and most definitely some love

Thank you

Thank you

No sir, thank you for these delightful planes!
Really nice designs. The angles look like they are from the future!
I was first trying to make some eagle, but it turned out to be some futuristic thing!

Man, this things on the end of wings are getting in season!

I love that!
